nodes.text: 1M-AU5 was the designation of a golden MSE-6-series repair droid that was active during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. As a MSE-series repair droid, it was produced by the company Rebaxan Columni, and like all units of the MSE-6 it stood twenty-five centimeters tall.

1M-AU5 was a companion droid available in the MMORPG Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures which was released by Sony Online Entertainment in 2010. The droid was rewarded to the first one million players who registered in the game, and was unavailable in any form afterwards. As 1M-AU5 was an optional companion, this article makes no assumption about if any character owned it.
